I am using the DateTimePicker control of MahApps.

Currently it's showing datetime in dd-mm-yyyy HH:mm format.But I need to show that in yyyy-mm-dd HH:mm Z format. I see currently it has no property which takes datetime format as string pattern. So how to do this?

A script cannot contain two functions with the same name. Rename your first onEdit function to onEdit1 (actually it will be better to assign a descriptive name) and the second function as onEdit2, then put them both in one function named onEdit and pass the parameter e to both of them:
The whole script should look like this:
